item.title: 职业拳击手出身的演员康纳-麦格雷戈（Conor McGregor）说，他与《公路之家》（Road House）的合作演员杰克-吉伦哈尔（Jake Gyllenhaal）之间的打斗场面 "非常真实"。
item.description:
Pro-fighter turned actor Conor McGregor says the fighting scenes between him and his “Road House” co-star Jake Gyllenhaal are “as real as it gets.” pic.twitter.com/XvEeIemIoG

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 15, 2024
